QUERY: Give me an itinerary for a 5D4N trip with my family, we love to eat spicy food

HAWKER_RECOMMENDATIONS.description: Enjoy a beachside hawker experience with Haron Satay, known for its spicy and flavorful satay skewers.
Famous for its spicy chili sauce that accompanies the tender chicken rice, a must-try for spice lovers.

HAWKER_RECOMMENDATIONS.dish_name: Liao Fan Hong Kong Soya Sauce Chicken Rice & Noodle
HAWKER_RECOMMENDATIONS.description: This Michelin-starred stall offers a spicy twist with its chili sauce, enhancing the savory flavors of the dish.

HAWKER_RECOMMENDATIONS.dish_name: Ri Ri Hong Mala Xiang Guo
HAWKER_RECOMMENDATIONS.description: Known for its mind-numbing spicy Mala Xiang Guo, a stir-fry dish with customizable spice levels.
Offers a spicy version of fried oyster, a local favorite with a kick of chili.

ATTRACTION_RECOMMENDATIONS.description: Gardens by the Bay is a futuristic garden featuring massive Supertrees and conservatories filled with diverse plant life. It is perfect for families and nature lovers.

ATTRACTION_RECOMMENDATIONS.attraction_name: Marina Bay Sands SkyPark Observation Deck
ATTRACTION_RECOMMENDATIONS.description: The Marina Bay Sands SkyPark Observation Deck offers breathtaking panoramic views of Singapore's skyline. Ideal for families, business travelers, and photographers.
The Singapore Flyer is one of the world's largest observation wheels, providing a bird's-eye view of the city. It's a must-visit for tourists seeking a unique perspective.
ArtScience Museum combines art, science, and technology, offering immersive exhibits. A great place for cultural enthusiasts and families.
National Gallery Singapore houses the world's largest collection of modern Southeast Asian art, making it a paradise for art enthusiasts.
